translations.name: Judaica Press Tanakh
translations.description: Judaica Press is a New York City based Orthodox Jewish publishing house founded in 1963. Their Mikraoth Gedoloth Nach (Prophets and Writings of the Tanakh-Hebrew Bible) is very popular among Orthodox Jews.

translations.name: American Publishing Company
translations.description_short: This publisher is most famous for having published Mark Twain.
